subject: Re: [junit] Before/After cannot be resolved to a type
msgSnippet: You need to import Annotations as well: org.junit.Before org.junit.After Greetings, Malte
messageBody:
You need to import Annotations as well:

org.junit.Before
org.junit.After

Greetings,
Malte

On 1 January 2011 20:34, joelemm <eugene@...> wrote:
> i'm trying to use the @Before, @After annotations and i get a "... cannot be resolved to a type" error.
>
> i am importing as follows:
>
> import org.junit.Test;
> import static org.junit.Assert.*;
>
> ....
>
> @Before
> public void setup() {
>        ...
> }
>
>
> methods annotated with @Test work fine.
> i am doing this from eclipse using JUnit4.
>
> any tips much appreciated.
>
>
>
> ------------------------------------
>
> Yahoo! Groups Links
>
>
>
>
